item.title: ‘Saturday Night Live’ Visual Effects Artists Ratify Historic First Union Contract
item.description: Fifteen visual effects workers at “Saturday Night Live” have unanimously ratified theirfirst union contract. All 15 eligible voters voted “Yes,” marking a significant milestone
